data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Möstel, Claudia, Schorr, Martin, Bechly, Günter (2017): A new stem-coenagrionoid genus of damselflies (Odonata: Zygoptera) from mid-Cretaceous Burmese amber. Zootaxa 4243 (1): 177-186, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4243.1.9|2 occurrences
